description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and innovation practices. yeehaa's blog posts and courses cover topics ranging from decentralized organizations and digital landscapes to personal growth and valuing differences, reflecting his multidisciplinary approach to fostering thriving, interconnected communities in the digital age.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur. Transforms education and tech. Founded Offcourse, created Superconnectors. Advocates inclusive internet. Explores decentralized systems, innovation, digital landscapes. Unites people around values, translates visions into ecosystems.
